title: This Makeup Artist Recreated BeyoncÃ©'s Pregnancy Shoot On Her Lips
text:
This Makeup Artist Recreated BeyoncÃ©'s Pregnancy Shoot On Her Lips BOW DOWN to this masterpiece. By Carly Ledbetter 
Makeup, ***Flawless. 
Makeup and lip artist extraordinaire Jazmina Daniel recently recreated BeyoncÃ©â€™s pregnancy announcement on her lips, and result is mind-blowing. In an Instagram post, Daniel said the artwork took her over four hours to recreate. 
â€œI know I have a lot of Queen ğŸ Fans out there! This one is for you! @beyonce Tag the Queen if you think sheâ€™d approve ğŸ,â€ Daniel wrote. A post shared by Jazmina Daniel (@missjazminad) on Feb 23, 2017 at 6:41pm PST 
The Beyhive is clearly crazy in love with the artwork. Fans couldnâ€™t get over Danielâ€™s incredible talent, as well as the accuracy of the lip art. 
â€œOMG WHO IS SHE OMG OMG EVERYTHING,â€ one commenter wrote. Another added, â€œI canâ€™t even apply lipstick properly like wtf?â€ 
Daniel, who is from Sydney, Australia, told The Huffington Post via email that her love for lip art started after she was diagnosed with a brain tumor. 
â€œI was at home sick every day and would turn to painting to keep my mind off things,â€ she said. â€œSlowly that painting would turn into makeup (face painting) which then led me to experiment with drawing something tiny on my lips. That was 5 years ago now and Iâ€™ve continued to love and do it since.â€ 
She added, â€œI chose to recreate Beyâ€™s pregnancy announcement because everyone was so excited about it. There were a lot of people recreating it in pictures and I know that a lot of my followers were BeyoncÃ© fans so it just seemed right to do. I felt inspired in the moment to do it!â€ 
Check out more of her gorgeous creations below: A post shared by Jazmina Daniel (@missjazminad) on Dec 8, 2016 at 6:16pm PST A post shared by Jazmina Daniel (@missjazminad) on Dec 26, 2016 at 8:22pm PST A post shared by Jazmina Daniel (@missjazminad) on Oct 4, 2016 at 7:08pm PDT A post shared by Jazmina Daniel (@missjazminad) on Feb 10, 2017 at 6:28pm PST A post shared by Jazmina Daniel (@missjazminad) on Jul 29, 2016 at 3:46pm PDT
